description: Try our easy to follow Cheese Ryvitas + Snacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheese Ryvitas + Snacks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.2 red capsicum, cut into strips (for cheese sandwich)
0.25 continental cucumber, thinly sliced and cut into sticks (for cheese sandwich)
1 tsp ground cinnamon (for honeycinnamon roasted chickpeas)
425g can organic chick peas, drained, rinsed (for honeycinnamon roasted chickpeas)

recipeInstructions.text: Cheese Sandwich: Top crispbread with cheese and tomato.

Wrap and place in lunch box with cucumber sticks, capsicum strips and 1 tbs Tzatziki Honeycinnamon Roasted Chickpeas: 1. Place chickpeas on a plate lined with paper towel and set aside to drain for 1 hour, to remove excess moisture.
Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Combine chickpeas, honey and cinnamon in a medium bowl. Place on prepared tray.
Roast, stirring every 10 minutes, for 2530 minutes or until golden brown and crisp. Remove from oven and set aside to cool. Store in an airtight container for up to 1 week.
Place half the chickpeas in a plastic container in the lunch box. Store remaining chickpeas in a plastic container.
